main event: An aluminum-shaped object was observed in level flight in Moneta, Virginia on February 4, 1965.
interesting points: The object was approximately 10-3 feet long and 12-15 inches wide., The object was gray in color and had no unusual features., The observation lasted for about 4-5 minutes before the object disappeared to the north., The sighting was made against a bright blue sky at an elevation of about 35 degrees., A mature and rational housewife was one of the witnesses.
